description: Retrieves the place index resource details.

parameters.name: IndexName
parameters.description: The name of the place index resource.

nested_items.name: IndexName
nested_items.description: The name of the place index resource being described.

nested_items.name: IndexArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the place index resource. Used to specify a resource across Amazon Web Services.

nested_items.name: PricingPlan
nested_items.description: No longer used. Always returns RequestBasedUsage.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The optional description for the place index resource.

nested_items.name: CreateTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp for when the place index resource was created in ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sssZ.

nested_items.name: UpdateTime
nested_items.description: The timestamp for when the place index resource was last updated in ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sssZ.

nested_items.name: DataSource
nested_items.description: The data provider of geospatial data. Values can be one of the following:

nested_items.name: DataSourceConfiguration
nested_items.description: The specified data storage option for requesting Places.

nested_items.name: IntendedUse
nested_items.description: Specifies how the results of an operation will be stored by the caller.
SingleUse specifies that the results won't be stored.
Storage specifies that the result can be cached or stored in a database.
